description: Dashboard of Kubernetes volume information at namespace level as exported by Prometheus connected to Kubernetes.

panels.title: Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes {namespace="$namespace"}) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes {namespace="$namespace"})) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes {namespace="$namespace"})) >= ($pvc_percent_used_warning_threshold / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.title: Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold

Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate - Alert History
Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate -  Predicted Available Space History
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold Stats - Current
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold

links.title: OpenShift Container Storage (OCS) 3.11: Operations Guide: 10.1. Available Metrics for File Storage and Block Storage

targets.expr: (1-max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info { namespace = "$namespace" }) ) unless (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes { namespace = "$namespace" })) or ((max by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info { namespace = "$namespace" }) ) and (max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes { namespace = "$namespace" })))

panels.description: WARNING: Any PVCs that are not bound to a running pod will not show up in this state.
